channel.title: Ffs >:(
channel.description:
For some reason i cant play any video files in windows media player or VLC media player. It shows nothing but black, no sound. Anyone know what i can do to fix this?
EDIT: [moparscape response] What!!!!!!! 9 views and no answers!! you guys should tell me what to do, before i rip your head off and shit down your neck!! [/moparscape response]

item.title: Ffs >:(
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:220482”][quote author=lordbost link=topic=287470.msg2337104#msg2337104 date=1216158182]

everything worked perfect a few days ago, i am not going to download a new program.
I want to find out why VLC and windows media player have stopped playing videos…

Mabes have virus?? System restore to teh dates that media player was working.

Just did a system restore, still not working
[/quote]

Be an man and reformat

EDIT: lol, have a look at the adverts[/quote]
i don’t have any vista install cd

EDIT: i dont want to reformat my pc…

so… anyone know what i can try to get it working again?

Read full topic

item.title: Ffs >:(
item.dc:creator: @lordbost lordbost
item.description:
@lordbost wrote:

[quote=“deoxys505, post:15, topic:218783”][quote author=magma828 link=topic=287470.msg2328412#msg2328412 date=1215782264]

wait, wait, maybe don’t look at porn, thought of that?

oh yeah of course, because the volume of porn watched on his computer affects video playback
[/quote]

Lol

Um, maybe try uninstalling both of them then reinstalling. That happened to me once. It was a problem with an MS update, and I had to manually start explorer when I booted up and a few programs glitched. Try uninstalling and see if youve updated anytime in the past whenever it stopped work time frame.[/quote]
I just reinstalled VLC and WMP but it still dont work

Read full topic

Um, maybe try uninstalling both of them then reinstalling. That happened to me once. It was a problem with an MS update, and I had to manually start explorer when I booted up and a few programs glitched. Try uninstalling and see if youve updated anytime in the past whenever it stopped work time frame.

item.title: Ffs >:(
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Not having the right DirectShow filter wouldn’t affect VLC, because it dosen’t use them…

Read full topic

item.title: Ffs >:(
item.dc:creator: @wow_raped_XD wow_raped XD
item.description:
@wow_raped_XD wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:6, topic:218783”][quote author=magma828 link=topic=287470.msg2326091#msg2326091 date=1215699410]
For a start WMP sucks. I don’t think it’s ever managed to play a video for me. Quicktime is okay, but I prefer Nero because it can actually read the stuff I try to play 95% of the time.
[/quote]

WMP has played everything I’ve ever thrown at it. You just don’t have the codecs for the movies you were trying to play. Get k-lite codec pack.[/quote]
http://www.free-codecs.com/download/K_lite_codec_pack.htm

I had to get a codec too, I wanted to watch stuff (halo 3 montages and w/e) but i need mpeg codec. Its no WMP its just that you computer does have the right codec, like jme said.

Read full topic

item.title: Ffs >:(

item.description:
@jme wrote:

On another topic

For a start WMP sucks. I don’t think it’s ever managed to play a video for me. Quicktime is okay, but I prefer Nero because it can actually read the stuff I try to play 95% of the time.

WMP has played everything I’ve ever thrown at it. You just don’t have the codecs for the movies you were trying to play. Get k-lite codec pack.

Read full topic
